website_summaries.verdict: Though the price is lower than similar models we tested, it's not as well made. We found that the SOLO Classic is the best deal for budget-minded users.
pros: An attractive briefcase that is ideal for students or professionals on a budget
Features numerous pockets for organization and a soft shoulder strap for easy, comfortable carrying
cons: The magnetized straps will pop open when the briefcase is full
The polyurethane-coated leather also has an unpleasant smell

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for essentials!
customer_reviews.text: First things first, love the bag! Would recommend to anyone and have for 2 of my colleagues at work who complimented it. Plenty of room for the essentials and I now have empty pockets because I can put what I need in the bag. The only drawback/negative is after 2 weeks of use, the strap over one of the buckles broke and now the buckle keeps releasing its spot. Minor annoyance, but just frustrated how it effects the look of the bag since it is so noticeable and of course on the front. Other than that, great bag, but would love a replacement if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Rhodes Family

customer_reviews.title: Classy Bag Perfect for Work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband about 15 months ago and it is still in great condition. Part of that is that it is sturdy and well-made; the other part of that is that he treats it well. He uses it for work and loves it. It is beautiful and sturdy, as long as you do not fill it too full or regularly put heavy objects in it. The inside has a padded pocket that could hold a tablet, but is too small for a laptop. But a 13" laptop fits in the main inside area. We also use it to carry our laptops when we go on trips. It is a roomy bag that looks really classy.
customer_reviews.author: TTMariessa

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, no structural issues!
customer_reviews.text: First off, the bag looks exactly like it's pictured! However, this is a more narrow bag, but it fit a couple of notebooks and my 15' laptop or two textbooks and some notebooks with no problem! I read some reviews and there seemed to be a big problem with the magnets and with the material used, I had no issues with either and I've been using this bag for some months now. I think this is a super cute bag and I've received a lot of compliments about it!
customer_reviews.author: Excalibur

customer_reviews.title: OK for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not the best bag in the world, but good value for $30.00. I've used it for a week on daily trips to NYC on the train. We'll see how it holds up in a few months. A lot of space, and pockets but a bit cheaply made. Looks like leather, but feels like vinyl. All in all a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD! But won't stretch for a 17"
customer_reviews.text: Everything about it was amazing and beautiful. I was very sad to return it. It does NOT work for a 17 inch laptop. The fabric is well stitched and heavy duty enough that you can't stretch it or turn it diagonal. I looked for any excuse I could find to keep it. It arrived quickly and the refund was credited quickly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lizaderp

customer_reviews.title: Compatibility and Functions
customer_reviews.text: In terms of compatibility, this bag is an amazing way to carry items at an affordable price. The strap is a little tricky to understand, but once you get the hang of it you’ll be fine. This is a fashion statement, because people don’t really know were it’s from but they like it. Lots of pockets to store things, and smooth leather. Also, I wore this in downpour rain, and the contents inside remained dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: one under front latches and one on the back * Yes this does come with a shoulder strap * Pocket that doesn't zip on the front *
customer_reviews.text: There's lots of features that you simply can't see from one picture. For example: * 2 Zipper compartments, one under front latches and one on the back * Yes this does come with a shoulder strap * Pocket that doesn't zip on the front * 3 Zipperless pockets inside * A large separator inside so you can keep something like an umbrella and laptop apart Extra info: this thing fits a Surface Pro 3 easily, and I bet it would hold a 15" retina Mac, but it'd be tight It lasts about a year or 2
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price
customer_reviews.text: Wow this little fella is a stunner. Needed a briefcase that looks good without breaking the bank. Very professional looking. Will fit iPad and MacBook 11". 13" doesn't fit the padded part. But can be put into the main compartment. Be careful not to put too much weight and carry it with handle. It seems pretty much made for small weight items. Still give it 5 just due to delivery options available. Very good value for buck. Ordered 23:00 on Saturday received Sunday afternoon, NYC area. So great for that last minute interviews etc that come up
customer_reviews.author: Bad Hair Spray

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke after a couple of weeks
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself is okay, but the stitching could use some work, especially on the straps. The main, long strap broke after just a couple of weeks, along with the metal ring it was attached to and the bag wasn't even that heavily loaded down with stuff. Unfortunately, this was a gift and the recipient didn't tell me about it breaking until after the 30 day return window was over. So, took it to a luggage repair and got it fixed up with a new metal ring and stitching for $10, but disappointing to have to spend more money on it that soon after buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie G

customer_reviews.title: Medical Student Approved!  High quality an affordable, best of both worlds!
customer_reviews.text: This briefcase is perfect for a full time student. I am a medical student and this was perfect because it was affordable but very nice looking. This will accomodate a textbook and my 13 inch macbook pro with charger and some papers and writing tools which was perfect for me. I did not expect a huge all encompassing carrying bag. I wanted it to look professional. I am considering ordering again in the darker brown since the price is so affordable and the quality is so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brown

customer_reviews.title: for anyone complaining about that of course it's not leather it's super cheap. I bough tit because I don't want ...
customer_reviews.text: NOT leather, for anyone complaining about that of course it's not leather it's super cheap. I bough tit because I don't want leather, and am very happy with it. The threads fray a bit more than a more expensive piece but it's not super cheap material. I like it a lot over all
customer_reviews.author: Justin Travis Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Trash, absolute trash!
customer_reviews.text: There are not enough bad words in the English language to discribe out worthless this purchase was. Too small, too flimsy, and cheaply made. Don't waste your money folks! I used this bag once and never used it again... that was almost 3 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lance

customer_reviews.title: Return process was smooth and easy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag as a graduation gift and was disappointed with the quality, so I returned it. I can't speak to durability but the material was thin and it LOOKED cheap, though it was nice to the touch, not stiff. The brown color is nice, very accurate in the photo shown- it isn't too reddish, or un-naturally bright, and I like the satin finish (vs hard glossy look). As I mentioned, I returned it, and was VERY PLEASANTLY SURPRISED with the ease of that process due to the order being "fulfilled by Amazon". Definitely a selling point for me, I'll look for that notation in the future.
customer_reviews.author: BetsyB

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas. He had taken to toting things around in a cloth shopping bag and I wanted him to have something professional looking that would work in a similar way. The bag is medium sized, nice looking leather and the magnetic clips that hold the straps on were a big hit for my husband, who does not want to fiddle with buckles and straps. The magnets have worked very well, and my husband is able to carry his iPad, papers, wallet and other necessities easily. He has loved it. And you really can't beat the price of this. All in all, an excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Felting Mom

customer_reviews.title: magnetic straps
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere does it say that the straps are held on with magnets, it is terrible. Bag does not stay closed. Adjusting the strap length is annoying because they totally detach. Punched holes are further apart than they should be. The bag is also about 1/2'' to 1" shorter than it should be. A regular sized newspaper sticks up out the bag. Not real leather bReally the magnets are the main complaint.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten many compliments. I bought this for my husband for a work trip and was looking for somethings nice yet affordable that could hold his work laptop and a few items. This did the job. He was reluctant but fell in love. It has so many storage compartments for random things that he ended up falling in love. The bag has a revert nice look to it. One of my greatest Amazon steals.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: HAd it for 3 years -looks good but  just ok really
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas 2017 (its now July 2020) - had to replace the shoulder strap last year - its small, but fits his MacAir but barely (lengthwise) and not much room for anything else - smaller pockets are that useful since its a stiff bag. It looks nice, but its small and a bit disappointing honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bag
customer_reviews.text: I've had my satchel for 3 years now and it finally broke when it got caught on a fence ( we were hoping the fence because we forgot the key to unlock it ) and while we jumped over and I didn't realize that the strap was hooked on the fence. So it took a 165lb pull to break the strap from the bag. During my 3 years of using this bag daily I certainly put it through a lot of strain. I'm about to buy a replacement for my first one. I would highly recommend this bag to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: great product for great price
customer_reviews.text: great price great product! seems well made. One note is that the picture shows it stuffed with paper or something because when you have the bag empty, it's very flimsy. 2 Year Update: Bag is still going strong...especially for $30. One of the straps broke about 6 months ago but I was able to fix it myself with a little work. The strap broke today but again, $30...what do you expect. Overall, the bag has served its purpose and been worth what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: J. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: It's okay for the price, but I would spend a little more for something better.
customer_reviews.text: Handle feels weak, the bag itself can't really hold much. I would return it and spend a little more money for a more quality bag, but for this price, I can't complain much.For $40, its not worth taking back IMO. I don't plan to use it often, maybe just to carry my mac and the charger and maybe a folder at the absolute most. It's not an everyday bag if you need to carry more than that. Also, the compartment of the bag that is meant to house your computer, is too small to fit a 13 inch laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Hurricane Game

customer_reviews.title: Leather Straps Snap Not Buckle. Good Cheap Leather Bag!
customer_reviews.text: The first thing i didnt like was the leather straps dont buckle they snap. The over all quality of the leather is just acceptable considering the price range its in. I wouldnt buy it again but if you need a good cheap leather bag this one will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W Jones

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my fiance for school and it works great! Only fits smaller sized laptops though. But other then that, his books and a small laptop/tablet will fit!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Hennessee

customer_reviews.title: Small bag for good quality
customer_reviews.text: Why i would keep this bag: 1. Quality is nice and smooth 2. Bag color is very nice 3. Side strap is not terrible RETURNING because : bag is small and does not fit a men’s planner binder in it. Small items would fit comfortably but but anything too big. Compartments are nice but also small.
customer_reviews.author: Keidy Guillen

customer_reviews.title: Best out there for the price
customer_reviews.text: There is no better laptop briefcase on the market for the price. I did have one of the straps rip on the back and release the buckle, but resewing it was easy and hidden because it was on the inside of the clasp. I use this for work and casual trips into the city on the weekend. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hip Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: A great bag in the light brown color
customer_reviews.text: A great bag in the light brown color, and big enough to hold what I need, but don't expect it to carry much more than your laptop and a book or binder, and then some writing utensils. It is bigger than one might assume, but don't stretch it. I only wish I had gotten it in black, as it would go with more of my outfits
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS BAG
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS BAG! It was so many pockets to help organize and looks really great. No matter how heavy it is it doesn't hurt my neck and I am able to cary two laptops; and multiple folders onto of all of my personal belongings (i.e.: cell phone, wallet, keys, pens, etc)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: however funny enough this gives it a rustic and well worn ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag has lasted me all year. I bring it with me every day, and it has held up. I get compliments on it regularly, although the build quality is a little on the low side. The stitching has frayed due to heavy use, however funny enough this gives it a rustic and well worn appearance. Absolutely unbeatable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Good for a first bag but not for a business professional
customer_reviews.text: Good value, would buy it if I couldent afford better but it does look cheap. It has that "shine" that looks cheap. If it were Matte it would be better but thats PU Leather.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Matias

customer_reviews.title: But as I have used it and got a ton of compliments I have really started to like it. Not only that but the functionality is ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this for me for my birthday. At first I wasn't sure if it was "me" or not. But as I have used it and got a ton of compliments I have really started to like it. Not only that but the functionality is great as well. It is kind of like a cross between a briefcase and a "murse" (man purse) or sachel haha. I love it and am super stoked. It looks and feels very professional.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very professional and amazing little briefcase, I purchased this for my college course and for when I graduate and start my new job. It is very professional looking and good quality bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality not so good
customer_reviews.text: Had this bag for maybe 3 months and the strap ripped off from the bag where it was sewn on. Definitely do yourself a favor and spend a little more to get a better quality bag. The leather definitely doesn't look real but thats to be expected for the price. My 13 inch macbook would not barley fit so if you aren't sure get a bigger bag. If you just want to try a messenger bag to see if you'll like it then its not a bad deal.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and was packaged incredibly well! As for the bag it went beyond my expectations. I can fit my Macbook Air, several folders, a notebook, and a paperback book in there well. There are also several pockets, one on the back on the outside and two under the flap. I can fit my phone charger plus my earbuds, and Air charger. There is an additional padded pocket on the inside area that would be great for a tablet. Overall, couldn't be happier with the bag, its great quality and does everything I need it for!
customer_reviews.author: SC5464

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It fits my needs perfectly. I wanted something easy to carry, not bulky and looks professional. It perfectly fits some papers, thin spiral notebook and my certification book (CCNA). Some mentioned that the straps dont stay in place (they are magnetic). I dont have that problem. I could see it happening if I packed more stuff in the bag. The inside is closed by a zipper to secure your things in place.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: for the price this bag is great, it does what its supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Such a trendy bag, for the price this bag is great, it does what its supposed to do. Only caution would be to not overfll as the latches wont close. the belts are for show it is actually a strong snap type closure. Ive had many compliments on this bag and it does fit my asus laptop but not much else will fit after. It also keeps shape well. Overall I love it though!!
customer_reviews.author: rosie

customer_reviews.title: For the price it can't be beat!
customer_reviews.text: For the price point I could not be happier. Seems well made have used for about a month without a problem. Perfect size for my chrome book. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: I have been very pleased with this bag so far
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with this bag so far. It has been complimented numerous times and looks far more expensive than it is. NOTE: make sure you know the size of the bag. I knew it was smaller than an average laptop bag based on the reviews and description, but if you are buying this for a larger laptop (15" or more) it won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why my bag was a good product, judging from the other reviews. Maybe a quality control issue, but I"ve been using mine now for days and grossly over-packed. No ripping or zipper failure as of yet. I really like this bag. I'll come back and re-review should the product fail. The one I received has put up with a fair amount of abuse from both me and my oldest daughter. So far anyway
customer_reviews.author: Reglue

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and practical! A masculine ,"Anti-ManPurse" look! Perfect size for day-to-day use. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for carrying my iPad, accessories and job paperwork. Very stylish and professional looking. The smell that reviewers gave negative comments about was not an issue with mine, I only experienced a faint leather smell, which is good because at least you know it's real leather. Not a super high quality product, hence only a three star rating, but hopefully it will last a few years. But can't complain about the low price I had paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: John H. formerly of La Grange, IL

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! It's just the right size...not too small...not too large! I work at home two days a week so I'm carrying files to and from the office. Perfect for laptop or tablet. The shoulder strap comes in handy when necessary. I'm really hard to please when it comes to briefcases, totes, and purses. This one pleases me. So glad I found it. Oh, and by the way, fantastic price!
customer_reviews.author: KWnc2987

customer_reviews.title: More of a purse than a true laptop bag
customer_reviews.text: More like a purse than a laptop bag, this item is well made but the design is fragile compared to the true laptop bags I've had. As long as you're careful not to overload it, it should look great and last a long time. I do think it's a great deal for the price. I am disappointed the interior is so lightly padded. Nevertheless it holds my Chromebook quite well. Mine had no problems regarding smell. Stitching and finish are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cox

customer_reviews.title: This kind of thing is my bag, baby.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bag for about 4 months now. It is holding up very well. I use it 5 days a week for work. It holds a lot of stuff and is very flexible. Looks nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Casey S

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is ok because it has a special thick pocket for a lap top but my school's lap top doesn't fit in it and I know it's a smaller sized lap top. It works well for the appearance of having a nice leather bag for a while but the edges start to fray after repeated use. The buckles snap into place and there's a front pocket that can hold a mouse. I usually use the padded pocket for things that could scratch the lap top.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Lucky bag!
customer_reviews.text: This accompanied me to oral argument in the U.S. 11th Circuit Court of Appeals. (I prevailed, so it is now my lucky bag.) I am pleased with the quality and aesthetic looks. It blended right in with other counsel carrying Prada cases. In fact, one such Prada briefcase carrying attorney asked me where I got it whereas he liked it over his briefcase. How could you go wrong?
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Can only fit a few flat items inside
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself is decent, could've been cheaper but whatever. Its slimmer than I expected, would be great for laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Marie

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: The briefcase looks good. Have not been used a lot, but I believe it will give many years of good use.
customer_reviews.author: sharron

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price. If you want top quality, go look for something $250+
customer_reviews.text: For $35 there’s nothing to complain about. This isn’t top notch quality but it looks professional. I don’t expect it to last a lifetime, but it will do it’s job. The straps are actually magnets, and much stronger than expected. This can’t hold anything too large but great for an iPad and a couple things you need to carry around. So far I’m happy
customer_reviews.author: Superman

customer_reviews.title: Cost less than 40 dollars but looks like a 200 dollar briefcase
customer_reviews.text: Very serviceable. I use it for carrying papers and notebooks back and forth. Cost less than 40 dollars but looks like a 200 dollar briefcase. Only drawback is that it was made to carry a lab top and a few papers. It's not for anything thick or bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This briefcase is well-constructed and looks really nice when you're wearing it. It fits all my stuff perfectly, (I routinely carry a couple of binders, spiral notebook and other papers.) Two interior pockets are great for mobile phone, headphones, etc, and two exterior pockets hold all my writing utensils and other items. Did I mention how nice it looks? I think that's really the main thing for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Volskay

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but will fall apart!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the look of this bag! I regularly get compliments on it. It has nice pockets for all your accessories. However, the bag started to fall apart after a week. The strap fell off after 2 weeks, and the piece that holds the buckle came apart. I would definitely not waste my money!
customer_reviews.author: BudgetHunter

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. Smooth material. It is thin so my husband did have to downsize his gym bag of work stuff but he says it's totally fine since this bag looks much more professional. He loves it! I would recommend this to anyone. The handle on the bag is sturdy and strong so hold all his heavy work stuff. While the shoulder strap is handy to have when he's helping me handing all our kids at church.
customer_reviews.author: Angie N Mike Lassig

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Falls Apart, Breaks
customer_reviews.text: The quality is terrible, and the strings hanging everywhere is your first clue. Also, the magnetic snap buttons kept opening as I walked, nearly resulting in all of my items spilling out onto the sidewalk several times. Finally, a front strap broke.
customer_reviews.author: JKConsumer

customer_reviews.title: I've gotten several compliments on its professional look and am highly satisfied for how much it cost me
customer_reviews.text: I never write review on an item unless I have had the item a few months. I was skeptic of buying this bag because of a few minor warnings such as the magnet snaps not holding as well as the odor of the bag however I have not experienced any of these problems. It is a little small if you want to carry around more than one subjects worth of books but most messenger bags tend to run smaller than this one. Over all I have never regretted buying this bag. I've gotten several compliments on its professional look and am highly satisfied for how much it cost me.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Just what he neeed and at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves his bag. He says it's comfortable and everything he needs (laptop, a book, a notebook) fits. Granted, we've only had it for a week, but so far we're very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Just don't.
customer_reviews.text: One of the fake buckel's has already broken, don't be fooled by the looks of this bag it looks and feels nothing like leather. I wish I never bought it. I's Aug 20th and I bought a new bag and I'm gong probably give this one away or sell it for $15.00 or what ever I can get for it, but if I can't anything for this bag I'll go back to the original plan of giving away.
customer_reviews.author: CJANY

customer_reviews.title: ... many compliments on this bag and it was a great value. real leather and very nice
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this bag and it was a great value. real leather and very nice. it's just a tad small to carry my Lenovo g50, but it can carry it. just not "well". it looks a little sloppy. but I can carry my business portfolios and client folders, etc.
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: I received this item on Saturday. On Monday after using it only a couple of times the leather loop on one of the straps, that holds the buckle in place that has the magnetic button on the strap to open and close it came off. That little loop is the only thing keeping the buckle from sliding off, needless to say a bag that you can only close on one side is not very secure. I ended up gluing the loop back on this mornig, instead of having to go through the hassle of trying to replace the briefcase. Needless to say, I consider this a design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Love it....
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Use it everyday. Nice leather and straps. Not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: VAmazonfan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good laptop bag for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good laptop bag for the cost! I have had mine for a while now and it holds up good minus a few threads coming undone. I get complements on it quite frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Polished look at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect small lightweight Briefcase for my laptop, pad, pens, and cellphone. It has a nice look to it. I have been using it for months and it is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Schinkel

customer_reviews.title: I like it and I'm keeping it
customer_reviews.text: I like it and I'm keeping it. But you get what you pay for. Build construction is marginal at best. A decorative leather strap fell off in a week but the bag looks good anyways and holds everything I need. My laptop (an HP elitebook) fits snugly, so I only throw it in when needed. The laptop actually fits fine, but the power supply really doesn't have a place but I can still squeeze it in. Overall, not too big, carries what I need, and looks pretty smart. Not a high quality bag but a good daily carry-all.
customer_reviews.author: Seumas J Regan

customer_reviews.title: Permanent creases
customer_reviews.text: Our bag came with a bunch of wrinkles in the material that don’t/won’t come out. Pretty bummed.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the price. I carried this to work every day for a few years and only now is the handle wearing out. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... cheap faux bag but it does the trick looks cool..
customer_reviews.text: U do get what you pay for this is a cheap faux bag but it does the trick looks cool... do people notice that it is a imitation... i dont think so. If u need for every day spend a little more. If for occasional then this is fine
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great look, but...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice size, comfortable strap, and classic look. I like this bag a lot, but it is NOT REAL leather, so it suffered wear and tear too easily where the strap attaches to the bag.
customer_reviews.author: FG

customer_reviews.title: Well Crafted, Beautiful Leather
customer_reviews.text: This men's messenger bag is a phenomenal deal! It is the most beautifully colored brown leather, fully lined with quality zipper pockets and main compartment zipper. Looks and feels like one costing a couple hundred dollars! I am EXTREMELY HAPPY with this purchase and about to place another order for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: TCDSoCal

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag -- HOWEVER
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag -- HOWEVER, the side shoulder strap fastener broke -- the metal totally broke apart and now the strap is useless within the first week. So I need to find a new strap to replace it. So if you really, really want a shoulder strap bag this one is NOT for you. Otherwise it's well built and does fit my laptop with a 15 inch screen very well, but don't expect a lot of room for much else. Also if you are rough with your bag you may want to invest in a very light protective sleeve for your laptop and budget the size accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case. I used it for an interview and it definitely looks professional. great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of positive comments on this. I think it's a bit too masculine for me but others say it's really pretty. Holds everything I need it to hold. Just wish it had a neck cushion because my stuff gets heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great satchel. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical upon reviewing some other comment on this product, but I am Extremely delighted with my purchase!!!! It is a perfect size to replace my previous which I always overloaded and carried way to many items. This is great because I carry less items and saves my shoulder for stressing with unnecessary clutter. Glad I decided to see for myself. Low cost and super product!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Lane

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart at the seams right at the two month mark. Take your money to street vendors in Chinatown before this vendor
customer_reviews.author: DENISE DICHIARA

customer_reviews.title: Misleading - Do not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: VERY MISLEADING - "Pu Leather" is plastic. This is a complete waste of money. This should not be permitted to be advertised as "leather" of any sort. The work vinyl should appear in the description or there should be an acknowledgement that this is not in any way a leather product. AMAZON should not permit misleading descriptions of this nature.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Reader

customer_reviews.title: In five days, it looked like it had been used for five months.
customer_reviews.text: It looked really nice when I got it, which is why it doesn't have one star. That niceness absolutely does not keep up for even moderate use (I used it as a nice messenger briefcase for a convention).
customer_reviews.author: A. Quesenberry

customer_reviews.title: a very good find
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a cool shoulder messenger style bag that fit my sense of style and my needs as I take metro to and from work. I wanted a bag that would look great with my suits (I purchased the black one in this picture) I'm thrilled with this bag. I LOVE everything about it and I have gotten lots of compliments on it. I have no clue why people wrote about its smell. None whatsoever. I can hardly believe that I payed $44 and some change inclusive of tax and shipping since had figured I was going to spend way over $100 for one. Good find.
customer_reviews.author: José

customer_reviews.title: A let down, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.text: Only a few months after use, the belts and clips fell off, the outside seam came apart, and the inside pocket fell out. I don't do anything major with this bag, I travel to and from work and class with it. Contrary to what it must sound like, I didn't put it in a blender. I purchased this item because of the good reviews. It sounds like maybe this was just a defective one--but I am thoroughly unsatisfied based on how this ended up.
customer_reviews.author: Sapperoth

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag, doesn't fit 13in Macbook Air
customer_reviews.text: The bag looks nice and has good function. It fits well and is easy to carry. I like if for those parts. I don't like that it can't accommodate my 13 inch macbook air; it won't fit in the designated computer section of the bag; I have to put it in the larger opening of the bag. The bag looks so nice and carries so well, I kept it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff, Texas

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not Great
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't what I expected, while the brief itself is fairly sturdy, the latches "snap" by each magnet, not very securely. I honestly thought the flap was tightened down by each strap, they are more for looks...3.5 star rating, okay BUT NOT GREAT
customer_reviews.author: norcaltakguy

customer_reviews.title: NIce briefcase for business use
customer_reviews.text: NIce briefcase for business use. Appearance and handles very good. A little cramped inside fr 15 inch laptp, but does squeeze in if not to much other stuff. Excellent fr the price. Super deal.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Kearns

customer_reviews.title: Classic Styling Grants Aura of Professionalism
customer_reviews.text: This bag has wonderfully classic styling and gives an aura of professionalism to those who carry it. It's not super spacious, but it does fit my 15.6" laptop-- it fits snugly, but it fits nevertheless. I really like this bag! If you're looking for a professional bag with classic styling to hold a few essentials (this won't hold a laptop, three binders, and lunch!), then this deal isn't one to pass up.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: It seemed fine to me
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for someone else. It seemed fine to me.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Sapphire

customer_reviews.title: I like the bag
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag. It's an attractive, compact and useful bag for school and work. I returned one because the stitching on a loop that holds the clasps that closes the bag fell apart. Same thing happened on the second. I chose to have a taylor fix the second bag (cost me $4.00) and I couldn't be happier. for the cost, it's not a bad bag.
customer_reviews.author: AC311

customer_reviews.title: Nice briefcase. Leather looks great
customer_reviews.text: Nice briefcase. Leather looks great; very stylish. Best for a smaller laptop with minimal other items. Has sufficient pockets for keys, headphones, etc. Strong magnetic buckles. Zipper is a bit wierd looking but seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Greco

customer_reviews.title: Eh--Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The "smell" issue is resolved after you let it air out for a couple of hours. It's definitely a cheap imitation, but that's all I was willing to invest in. My biggest issue with the product is the handle. It's a thin, lightweight strip of imitation leather that is not comfortable in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Downs

customer_reviews.title: Looked great, but has literally fallen apart
customer_reviews.text: Looked great, but has literally fallen apart. My husband uses it occasionally so it isn't due to overuse. I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice small bag
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, not sure how it will hold up looking at the connections. Has great space and is a great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: The bag is nice and I was using it for work
customer_reviews.text: The bag is nice and I was using it for work. I got it with a gift card so the loss did not hit my wallet. Within the first month the seams started to undo. The buckles fell off and the flap was just all over the place. Looked nice new but a little use and it was already falling apart. I guess you get what you pay for here. Don't buy and spend a bit more on a nice quality bag.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian C

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as I'd like, but very attractive bag
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I'd like, but very attractive bag. The inside padded pocket fits my Chromebook perfectly and leaves just enough room for one large textbook and notebook. The outside pockets are large enough for my calculator, pens, and accessories as well. And again, pretty good looking and useful bag!
customer_reviews.author: Coach B

customer_reviews.title: High quality & perfect price!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are absolutely wonderful! And for the price they can't be beat. Also, they come protected by 2 inner bags which to me reflects a high care for their product. The quality, feel, and look are amazing. Purchased both Brown/Black and will definitely be picking up the Light Brown after receiving these today.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag!
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about this because of some of the reviews, but the bag I received is really nice. It's real leather, seems very sturdy and is really attractive. It's not huge, but I knew what the measurements were and it's fine for what I need (carting my class notes and materials back and forth). Very nice bag for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's nice, good pockets
customer_reviews.text: I got this to take to interviews. It's nice, good pockets. The leather is in slightly different tones in 2 places, but I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: gwyn

customer_reviews.title: Good bag.  Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great bag that was given to me as a gift. Perfect for a computer and a notebook, with other small pockets for things. One negative is it has a zipper that isn't well designed, but it is in no way a deal breaker. Good briefcase/over the should bag
customer_reviews.author: Mike the Pharmacist

customer_reviews.title: Matchbox 20
customer_reviews.text: They should call this bag the Matchbox 20 because "everything falls apart, you can count on that"
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A Charland

customer_reviews.title: Too small to be useful
customer_reviews.text: It's too small to be really useful as it can't fit much of what a business professional would need to carry
customer_reviews.author: kpsummers99

customer_reviews.title: The metal hook of the bag strap crumbled in half ... [UPDATED]
customer_reviews.text: The metal hook of the bag strap crumbled in half after a week of use. I kid you not, the thing flat out broke into two pieces while I was walking one day. What kind of metal crumbles?! DO NOT BUY THIS BAG. UPDATE: I contacted the seller and they were very happy to replace the strap for me. The replacement was very quick, and the bag does not seem to have any other problems so far... Great customer service, changed from 1 star to 4 stars because the bag is very nice otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice briefcase for our purposes
customer_reviews.text: Used for a prop in a play set in the 1930's. Worked great for our purposes. Not totally authentic to the time period...but noone off stage could tell. Overall good quality. Arrived in good shape and was overall a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Welch

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: Briefcase looks very handsome and works well for traveling. Unfortunately one of the straps to close the briefcase (magnetic snap) came apart on the 3rd day of using it. For the price it's a great bag to have but expect slight issues with the snap closure.
customer_reviews.author: l0ve2read

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made and roomy
customer_reviews.text: My son just graduated college and this was one of his gifts. Very nicely made and roomy. He uses it daily and is happy with. Sturdy straps as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this briefcase, and I guess for the price its fine. You can clearly tell its not high quality though. The embossed logo looks cheap, the material (not sure if its leather or not) doesn't have a good weight of feel to it. I guess you get what you pay for, and I was looking for more.
customer_reviews.author: NV

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice, however it wasn't what my hubby wanted. He wanted a backpack. I thought this was much nicer (and it is.) Second one of this type I've purchased from this company. I didn't send this one back. Someone else is going to get a nice gift sometime!
customer_reviews.author: HRH

customer_reviews.title: Nice briefcase!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality briefcase, I see no flaws in the stitching as mentioned by other reviewers. It has a classy look like it should cost a lot more money. Very roomy. Happy with this purchase - thank you!
customer_reviews.author: poochie's mom

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for the bf and I must say I loved it! Great size so his laptop can fit in it and it looks very sturdy. There was no problem with the smell as others said in some reviews. My bf loves it and is very excited to start using it. So I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Shilohna

product_meta.title: Zebella Men Vintage PU Leather Briefcase 15 inch Laptop Shoulder Messenger Bag Tote
feature_bullets: Leather. Dimension(L * W * H): 14.57 * 4.7 * 10.43 inches. NOTE: this leather bag cover is used hard leather, not soft leather

Structure: A total of 5 pockets.1 main compartments,1 interior side zipped pocket ,1 mobile phone holder,1 wallet holder,1 back zipped pockets, Multi-function storage area(A4 papers, pens, cards, key, ect), Adjustable & Removable nice shoulder straps
Multifunctional: Take this bag to work or school to use for your laptop, notebooks, magazines, books, folders, cell phone, wallet, etc
Durable: This strong leather is very durable and can hold all of your necessities for your every day use

Satisfaction Guarantee: 100% quality inspection & 30 day money back guarantee. If you have any issue with the messenger bag or for any reason you're not 100% satisfied, please do not hesitate to contact us

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars901 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
